title: My account got reset with the name being something completely different
body:
Riot please help i just logged onto my acc and it got reset. No champs no runes no friends and the name of the account is different too. I used email to confirm that i used the right login and it was right. i have shit ton of skins on that account pls @riot
https://imgur.com/TF1tI81

replies.body: I've looked over this account, and it this one isn't showing that it's ever been over level 1. Could you have been thinking of a different account possibly, or one on a different region than NA? Let me know if I checked the wrong account, or you're always welcome to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well!

I've had this account since season 3. I've always been playing in NA. Yes this PdNaCO account has never been over level 1, but this isn't my account. My account seemed to be just completely deleted and replaced with this level 1 PdNaCO when i type my original user and pass that i've been using for the past 4 years.

https://imgur.com/a/dCfTS

You first mentioned that this is your account from season 3, then said that this isn't actually your account? I was able to find the account in the screenshot, and that one is active and is in fact level 30. It sounds like you might just be logging into the wrong account. You may just be using the wrong username when trying to login, but if you're still having problems getting signed into the account in the screenshot, reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can help.

No, it just seems like the username and pass that I've been using for years doesn't sign me into the lvl30 account anymore, like it should! Instead, it signs me on to this PdNaCO. the lvl 30 acc (in the 2nd screenshot) is the one i've been using since season 3. It's like riot has gave away my acc and assigned me a new one what the heck.

We can't actually change usernames, so that's definitely not what happened. I can see these two accounts are completely separate and you're logging into PdNaCO because you're using the username and pass associated with that account, and not the one you're wanting to login to. If you can't remember the other username, feel free to use the [**Forgot my Username**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/eune/en/forgot-username) option, or go ahead and shoot us that ticket.
I also shot you guys a ticket but got no reply

Yes.. I did the recover my account through email.. and it sent me straight back to this PdNaCO login username. I just want my lvl30 account back please....is there a way to see what the username attached to that account is..? I can name you all my friends on that account, I can do anything to prove that I iNdeed owned that account.
